Plot: The 8th Plague is the story of a woman named Launa who is investigating the disappearance of her sister, Nikki. Nikki had gone camping in the mountain town of Halcyon Springs and never came...
Title: The 8th Plague
Writer: Eric Williford (story), Franklin Guerrero Jr. (story), J. Michael Whalen (story), Eric Williford (screenplay)
Actors: DJ Perry, Leslie Anne Valenza, Terry Jernigan, Charles Edwin Powell
